about_the_game:
"PARADISE" is a small third-person 3D adventure game.

You have arrived at Paradise City, a futuristic metropolis.

Explore Paradise City and complete quests requested by the townspeople.

You can talk to the townspeople by approaching them.

Player Controls

  • Move: W, A, S, D

  • Jump: Spacebar

  • Run: Shift Key

  • Pause Menu: ESC Key

  • Options: Tab Key

content_descriptors.notes:
The main character shoots people or things with a gun.
(There's no bloodshed, no Gore, no grotesque scenes.)
